item.title: Avaya Aura for OneCloud Private
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Apache Log4J Vulnerability - Impact for Avaya products Avaya Product Security https://support.avaya.com/helpcenter/getGenericDetails?detailId=1399839287609 Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Avaya is scanning and monitoring its OneCloud Private environments as part of its management activities.
